main.java.board

Interface IMove

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BishopMovesInCircleBoard, BishopMovesInSquareBoard, DragonMovesInCircleBoard, KingMovesInCircleBoard, KingMovesInSquareBoard, KnightMovesInCircleBoard, KnightMovesInSquareBoard, PawnMovesInCircleBoard, PawnMovesInSquareBoard, QueenMovesInCircleBoard, QueenMovesInSquareBoard, RookMovesInCircleBoard, RookMovesInSquareBoard

    public interface IMove
    Interface to manage the movement behaviors of a piece in any type of chessboard.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Square> getMoves(IChessboard board, Piece piece, boolean ignoreKing)
      Return the possible moves of the given piece

    • Method Detail

      • getMoves

        ArrayList<Square> getMoves(IChessboard board,
                           Piece piece,
                           boolean ignoreKing)
        Return the possible moves of the given piece
        Parameters:
        board - the instance of the board which contains the piece
        piece - the instance of the piece to extract the possible moves
        ignoreKing - if active, it will not check if its King will remain safe
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Squares with the possible moves of the piece
